org.coniks.coniks_test_client

Class KeyOps

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.coniks.coniks_test_client.KeyOps

  • public class KeyOps
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements all operations involving encryption keys that a CONIKS client must perform.

      KeyOps()

    • Method Detail

      • loadDSAPublicKeyFile

        public static java.security.interfaces.DSAPublicKey loadDSAPublicKeyFile(java.lang.String uname)
        Loads a public key from a stored file.
        Parameters:
        uname - the username for which to load the public key
        Returns:
        the public key or null upon an error.

      • loadDSAPrivateKeyFile

        public static java.security.interfaces.DSAPrivateKey loadDSAPrivateKeyFile(java.lang.String uname)
        Load the CONIKS client's private key from the file.
        Parameters:
        uname - the username associated with the key to load
        Returns:
        The client's private key, or null in the case of an Exception.

      • saveDSAPublicKeyFile

        public static boolean saveDSAPublicKeyFile(java.lang.String uname,
                           java.security.interfaces.DSAPublicKey pubKey)
        Saves the given user's public key as encoded bytes. It's the caller's responsibility to ensure that the an existing saved public key can be overridden.
        Parameters:
        uname - the username whose public key is to be stored.
        pubKey - the public key to store for this user
        Returns:
        whether the save succeeded

      • saveDSAPrivateKeyFile

        public static boolean saveDSAPrivateKeyFile(java.lang.String uname,
                            java.security.interfaces.DSAPrivateKey pr)
        Saves the given user's private key to a file. Generates an empty keystore if one doesn't exist.
        Parameters:
        uname - the username for which the key pair is to be saved
        pr - the private key to be saved
        Returns:
        whether the private key was successfully saved or not

      • saveDSAKeyPairFile

        public static boolean saveDSAKeyPairFile(java.lang.String uname,
                         java.security.KeyPair kp)
        Saves the given key pair to disk. Generates an empty keystore for the private key if one doesn't exist.
        Parameters:
        uname - the username for which the key pair is to be saved
        kp - the key pair to be saved
        Returns:
        whether the save succeeded

      • generateDSAKeyPair

        public static java.security.KeyPair generateDSAKeyPair()
        Generates a DSA key pair for the client.
        Returns:
        the DSA key pair or null in case of an error
